content_html: The Nepali film 'Anjila' has been officially chosen to represent Nepal at the 98th Academy Awards, also known as the Oscars. The award ceremony will take place in 2026. The film will compete in the International Feature Film category. This decision was announced by The Oscar's official selection committee

title: Nepal Selects 'Anjila' for the 98th Oscars
